mapper.sql: SELECT user_id "id" , user_password "password" , user_name "username" , user_email "email" , user_regdate "regdate" , user_nickname "nickname" , user_phonenum "phonenum" FROM user WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(user_password, user_name, user_email, user_nickname, user_phonenum) VALUE(#{password}, #{username}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{phonenum})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_email = #{email}, user_password = #{password}, user_nickname = #{nickname}, user_phonenum = #{phonenum} WHERE user_id = #{id}
